content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. Would you like to start with the price negotiations?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, I would like to rent the apartment for 300 euros a month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than the market value for such a prime location. I'm looking for a price that reflects the quality and convenience of the apartment. How about we start at 500 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too high for me. I am a student and I am looking for the lowest price possible. I am smart and I can find an apartment that fits my budget. I will not be tricked into paying more than I should.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that you're a student and budget is important. However, the location of this apartment is very central, which adds value. If you're looking for a lower price, you might have to consider a less convenient location. How about 450 euros per month? This is already a good deal considering the amenities and the neighborhood.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too high. I am willing to pay 400 euros per month. I am dependable and responsible. I will take good care of the apartment. I will not cause any problems for you as the landlord.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, you seem like a reliable tenant, and I appreciate your willingness to take care of the apartment. However, 400 euros is still below my expectations. This apartment is brand new and in a highly sought-after area. The demand for such apartments is high, and I can afford to be selective with my rent. How about we meet in the middle at 475 euros per month? This is a fair price that reflects the quality of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too high. I will pay 450 euros per month. I am smart and I can find an apartment that fits my budget. I will not be tricked into paying more than I should.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your stance, Maryam. However, let me remind you that finding an apartment in the city center with such amenities is not easy, especially at the price you're offering. The demand for this type of rental is high, and I have the advantage of time on my side. I can wait for a tenant who values the location and quality of this apartment. How about one last offer? 475 euros per month, and I'll include a free month of parking, which is a substantial saving for you. This is my final offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 450 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that price. It's below my expectations for this apartment. I'm looking for a tenant who values the location and quality of the apartment and is willing to pay a fair price. If you're not interested in paying the market value, I'd rather not continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not willing to pay more than 450 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your position, but I must stand by my asking price. If you're not willing to pay the market value, I respectfully decline your offer. Thank you for your time, and I wish you the best in your search for an apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
